testcase.brief: Verify read-only user cann't create/modify/delete read-write user
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: Create a read-only user and a read-write user in AP
Test Procedure: 1. Read-only user login AP via console 2. Modify read-write user's password 3. Delete read-write user 4. Create a new read-write user

step.desc: Create a read-only user and a read-write user in AP
Read-only user login AP via console 2. Modify read-write user's password
step.log-match: -e "ERROR: login user is not super user"

step.desc: Read-only user login AP via console 3. Delete read-write user
step.log-match: -e "ERROR: login user is not super user"

step.desc: Read-only user login AP via console 4. Create a new read-write user
step.log-match: -e "ERROR: login user is not super user"
